item.title: Acree opens up new enterprise-focused, customizable AI model AFM-4.5B trained on ‘clean, rigorously filtered data’

item.title: Stack Overflow data reveals the hidden productivity tax of ‘almost right’ AI code
item.description: Stack Overflow survey shows that as more enterprise developers actually use AI tools, their expectations aren't being met by reality.
